fulltext:
Phan Dang Dien
SOFTWARE ENGINEER
Hanoi, Vietnam
  phandd
Sum mary
Currently Full Stack Javascript developer at open source company Linagora. 2+ years experience specializing in Javascript. Super nerd who loves
Linux and enjoys to customize all of development environment. Interested in trying, learning new technologies, tools, devising a better method
for challenging tasks. English lover and music enthusiast.
Work Experience
OECSolution
Hanoi, Vietnam
SOFTWARE ENGINEER
Jan. 2017 - Jun. 2017
• Front-end Developer, take part in building an awesome beautiful responsive HTML/CSS template, which ended up has almost 2K sales on
Themeforest market.
Linagora Open Source Organization
Hanoi, Vietnam
JAVASCRIPT FULL STACK DEVELOPER
Aug. 2017 - now
• Working, contributing to open-source community.
• Take part in designing multi-services system, building Restful API for a collaborative platform (OpenPaas).
• Developing frontend modular applications.
• Integrating multiple microservices (Search engine, mail servers, DAV servers, storage service...) to a collaborative platform.
• Implementing unit test, integration test.
• Developing major, minor open-source modules to integrate with collaborative platform.
• Deploying, setting up CI/CD for microservices.
Areas of Expertise
Environments
Linux, Node.js, Modern browsers
Frameworks/Libraries
AngularJs, ExpressJs, ReduxJs, ReactJs, Mongoose, SocketIO
Programming languages
Javascript, Python
Domain-specific languages
HTML5, CSS3
Development tools
Git, Docker, Grunt, Webpack, Gitlab CI/CD, npm, bower, LESS, Pug
Testing
Unit test, integration test, Karma, Mocha, Sinon, Chai
Databases
MongoDB, Redis
Search Engines
Elasticsearch
Development Methodologies
Agile/Scrum
Languages
English (advanced), Vietnamese
Por tfolio
Open-source projects: https://github.com/phandd
Edu cation
VNUA (Vietnam National University of Agriculture)
Hanoi, Vietnam
B.S. IN INFORMATION AND TECHNOLOGY
Mar. 2013 - Aug. 2017
Honors & Awards
2016
Top 6 excellent projects, Hack-a-farm agriculture innovation hackathon by YSEALI
Hanoi
MAY 6, 2019
PHAN DANG DIEN · RÉSUMÉ
